alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:35PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Elder County through 415 PM MDT... At 335 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Riverside, or 11 miles northwest of Tremonton, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Riverside, Garland, Elwood, Deweyville, Penrose, Bothwell and Thatcher. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 378 and 387. Interstate 84 between mile markers 30 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
